reviewText: Shipped out quickly.  Love the television series!!  Thanks!!

1. Excellent production values
2. Strong scripts
3. Strong acting
4. No laugh-track
5. Fabulous Fifties House Design!

Overall a true classic from the 1950's. Worth getting for anybody interested in classic TV! And a lot more subtle than some other shows from the decade.

Episodes on disc are:
Many Happy Returns
Father's Pet
Spooks
The Big Game

Picture quality is pretty good for an Alpha Video release.

They sure don't make 'em like this anymore.  Worth a watch & adding to your collection.  Very rare.

Nostalgia lovers, enjoy!  A treat.
